name: Cyklodev WP Auto Summarizer
author: Cyklodev

sections.description:
Cyklodev WP Auto summarizer allow you to put the shortcode cyklodev_summary/cyklodev_plan in a post and auto magically generate the summary.

Usage

Put the following shortcode at top of your post [cyklodev_summary] or [cyklodev_plan]

Support

Feel free to submit issues or request to zephilou @ cyklodev . com
sections.faq: Is this a roxy plugin ? It might be !
sections.changelog:
• 1.1.0 : Add abstract capability
  • 1.0.2 : Limit menu + configuration to administrator
  • 1.0.1 : Integrate WordPress.org reviews
  • 1.0.0 : First version
